channel.title: forums.whonix.org broken on Safest settings
channel.description: Hello something is wrong with Tor Browser and I think particurarly NoScript. When I visit forums dot whonix dot org on Tor Browser with slider on "Safest" I can only see: [HOME] [DOWNLOAD] [DOCS] [NEWS] [SUPPORT] [TIPS] [ISSUES] [DONATE] But when I disable javascript in about:config ("javascript.enabled" to "false") it works as it should, I see threads and so on. duckduckgo dot com doesn't make redirect as it should and there are no listings, site is too broken. It's not Whonix exclusive (it happened on Windows virtual machine) but I think it's worth posting here (I'm Whonix user.) I posted about this problem on #tor IRC but no one really acknowledged it. Sorry if I post in the wrong category.

item.title: forums.whonix.org broken on Safest settings
item.dc:creator: bosman
item.description:
No, it’s not a duplicate. I understand that javascript is required to sign up.
But after NoScript update to 11.2.1 or 11.2.2 all sites are completely broken (on Safest settings), not only forums Whonix org. Whole page content is not visible.
Setting javascript.enabled to false in about:config solve the issue.

Read full topic

item.title: forums.whonix.org broken on Safest settings
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Unsupported.

Whonix – 19 Jun 20

Undocumented / Untested / Unsupported

This feature is either undocumented, untested, or unsupported. Options: Become Contributor / Apply Free Support Principle / Purchase Professional Support.

Not sure this forum thread is a duplicate but very much related to this existing discussion:

Turn off Javascript in Whonix Forums Website
Looking at the new forum, it has put me off to registering because it requires: Javascript to browse the site properly Email-address to join site Both these shouldn’t be compulsory for this forum.

Read full topic

item.title: forums.whonix.org broken on Safest settings
item.dc:creator: bosman
item.description:
I am experiencing the same problem. I think NoScript version 11.2 is working fine. The problem occurs after automatic NoScript update to 11.2.1 or 11.2.2

Manually setting javascript.enabled to false in about:config seems to solve the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: forums.whonix.org broken on Safest settings
item.dc:creator: someanon
item.description:
Hello something is wrong with Tor Browser and I think particurarly NoScript. When I visit forums dot whonix dot org on Tor Browser with slider on “Safest” I can only see:
[HOME] [DOWNLOAD] [DOCS] [NEWS] [SUPPORT] [TIPS] [ISSUES] [DONATE]
But when I disable javascript in about:config (“javascript.enabled” to “false”) it works as it should, I see threads and so on. duckduckgo dot com doesn’t make redirect as it should and there are no listings, site is too broken.
It’s not Whonix exclusive (it happened on Windows virtual machine) but I think it’s worth posting here (I’m Whonix user.) I posted about this problem on #tor IRC but no one really acknowledged it. Sorry if I post in the wrong category.

Read full topic
